attributes.additional_details:
AI image generation has been and continues to be used to generate revenge/child pornography and ai companies have been entirely complicit by not making sufficient guard rails to prevent the material from being made. Regulations need to be put in place to stop this from happening or the problem will continue to get worse without government intervention.

Stop the damage AI continues to do to the UK.
attributes.background: AI  image/video generation should be heavily regulated by the government and new laws such as forcibly watermarking images/videos, preventing users from creating pornographic material of any kind and regulating its usage for anyone under 18

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require generative AI watermarks & ban using people’s likeness without consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736690
